description:
Keeps closing without any obvious reason, clicking "X" or "Menuitem--> Exit".

It continues to also, complain about opening any other folders that do not grant normal user permission(s). (Even after checking to see that those are owned by "ROOT". So if it will not open my archived harddrives and/or folders that are NOT in my /HOME/PICTURES, then this software is useless... and will be uninstalled ...
summary: If it would open and run without sudo folder privileges ..

description: I have not tried all of the settings yet, although it seems to work well for the sorting portion. My biggest problem is the app does not fit the screen properly and is too big. I also cannot shrink it or minimize.
